caption:
This photograph captures a serene maritime scene at what appears to be either dawn or dusk, given the soft lighting and the calmness of the water. In the foreground, a small rowboat with two occupants is the main focus. The individuals in the boat are engaged in an activity, possibly checking or setting fishing lines or nets, as suggested by the lines visible in the water stretching into the distance.

The water is textured and reflects the light beautifully, creating shimmering patterns that enhance the tranquility of the scene. In the background, the silhouette of a lighthouse is visible, adding a quintessential maritime element to the composition. Additionally, another boat can be seen further in the distance, suggesting this area is active with small-scale maritime activities.

The horizon is lined with faint landforms, possibly islands, adding depth to the scene and emphasizing the expansiveness of the seascape. The overall atmosphere of the photograph is peaceful and evocative, capturing a moment of daily life on the water with a hint of the vastness and beauty of the marine environment.
title: Fishermen check nets. They are catching fish that return to the ocean from up river spawning grounds.
